data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,703,002 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples, Ethiopia. Please, stir the 2,703,002 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, help your children in Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples, Ethiopia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples, Ethiopia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arbore people.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 15,042,500 citizens of the the state of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples, Ethiopia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.focus_label: Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples, Ethiopia

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 12,339,498 lost in Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
